name: Louis Armstrong: An American Songbook
overview: The audio portion of this compact disc is fully compatible with any CD player. Play the disc on a Compact Disc-Interactive player, thought, and CD-i lets you explore the achievements and the life story of Louis Armstrong as you listen to his music. At the touch of a button, CD-i brings you rare interview segments with Satchmo himself, and visual profiles of great American composers like Cole Porter, Duke Ellington, and George and Ina Gershwin in this fully interactive songbook. – Browse through photographs of Louis Armstrong on your TV screen as you learn about the man, his music and the early jazz era. – Follow on screen lyrics cued to the music. – Choose from a discography of Louis’s recording history on the Verve Label to see liner notes and key credits for each of the works.
